case.state: It's nice to meet you all! I've never played this before, but I'm excited to get started!
Hail, and well met, my brave heroes! ...Juuuust kidding~!
I think I need ~cards~ cards!
Lemme have ~cards~ new cards!
I think another ~cards~ will make this hand!
Gimme ~cards~ please!
Hehe, I guess I do! I didn't know you were a comedian, Clover!
Huh? I guess carrots are tasty, but I'm more of a tomato kinda gal! Why do you ask, Elizabeth?
Ears you can wear...? Uh, Joey- Mine are real!
Is it really okay to play this sort of game with royalty...?
Haha, I guess this is a girls' night! I've never been to one, before!
I'm glad I can start this game off with a boom! Huh? It's 'start it off with a bang'? ...I like how mine sounds better.
It's like the old Therian proverb goes, good things come to those who swap their cards! ...Am I remembering right?
I have a lot I can lose, but I won't complain about this hand!
This hand is as sweet as honey!
Aces are high cards, right? Oh, I should've checked earlier...
I almost feel bad, this is a really unbeatable hand!
I know I don't need the best hand to stay dressed, but that doesn't mean I can't get happy about having a good one!
I don't have much experience, but this hand looks good!
Here's hoping I can keep getting good hands!
This looks good! I think I'll be okay!
The floors here are pretty dirty, huh? I wonder who cleans around here...
Oh! I wasn't expecting this hand!
I'll see how this plays out, but I'm feeling pretty confident.
Sorry if I get too worked up- This hand is just that good!
I must have done something right!
Thank you for that, dealer!
Alright, this looks good~!
This should work out...
I'm all out of small things, so I'm glad this is prolonging things!
It's funny how happy a good hand can make you when you're out of little stuff.
Yes! This is good, here we go!
It's like the old Therian proverb, too little too late! ...What do you mean that's not a positive saying?
Wheew!! Thanks, dealer!
Yes! No masturbating Jenetta for you!
Haha! I'll admit, you're not bad, Jin.
Haha! I'll admit, you're not bad, Jin.
Hehe, I guess I do! I didn't know you were a comedian, Clover!
Huh? I guess carrots are tasty, but I'm more of a tomato kinda gal! Why do you ask, Elizabeth?
Ears you can wear...? Uh, Joey- Mine are real!
Is it really okay to play this sort of game with royalty...?
Haha, I guess this is a girls' night! I've never been to one, before!
I was hoping for a better starting hand, but this is okay!
You've never met a Therian before? Oh, well, I hope I'm setting a good example! Therians are like... Beastfolk!
Are you wondering how I can tell what my hand is with my eyes closed? Hehehe- It's a secret!
Oh, why do I have ears like this? I'm a Therian, haven't you seen one before?
This hand should help me keep my clothes! I think, I mean?
Uhm, this should work out!
You know the old Therian saying- Play the hand you're dealt!
I'm not very good at this game, but I know a good hand when I see one! ...I think?
What does everyone else have? Good hands, I hope?
My parents always taught me to stay upbeat when I wasn't sure about something! Does that surprise you?
I wonder what I should make for dinner when I get back to the Inn...
No one here has a very good poker face, huh? Well, I don't, either, but...
Someone probably has worse than this hand, I think!
I'm glad you're not picking favorites, dealer!
I was worried I wouldn't be able to figure this game out, but it's actually pretty easy!
I think this hand is pretty typical... But I don't need to have the best hand, right?
I'm a little unsure, but things should be fine!
My hand's pretty average, but I think I'm safe?
I can't complain about a hand like this!
I should be safe, I think.
It just needs to get me through to the next round.
This hand might have saved my apron... But I shouldn't dwell on 'might haves'.
Cmon, now! Pull through for me!
Okay, let's see if I can keep my dress on...
I shouldn't be uncertain at a time like this!
A flaky hand at a time like this? Yeesh!
It's not the worst hand in the world... Cmon, pull through for me!
Haha! I'll admit, you're not bad, Jin.
Hehe, I guess I do! I didn't know you were a comedian, Clover!
Huh? I guess carrots are tasty, but I'm more of a tomato kinda gal! Why do you ask, Elizabeth?
Ears you can wear...? Uh, Joey- Mine are real!
Is it really okay to play this sort of game with royalty...?
Haha, I guess this is a girls' night! I've never been to one, before!
I hope this isn't a sign for the rest of the game...
Oh, rabid acorns!
Well, I had to lose sooner or later, right?
I think I threw away my good cards by mistake...
This could be dicy. I can do this, though!
Dealer! It's not polite to give people trash!
Smiling is good for you, yknow! Even with a hand like this...
This hand isn't very good, but I'm having fun, anyway.
I should just be happy we aren't playing with money! My sisters didn't let me bring any, anyway.
Dealer, are you sure about these cards?
I'm a little worried, but someone might have worse!
Mmmmgh... This hand...
No worries! I can make this work!
This could get close...
Even if I lose this round, it's fine, because I'm having fun!
I guess I'll just... See how this works out.
Oh, this... could be bad.
Oh- I'm not worried! No worries.
If I keep smiling, everything will be fine, right?
Rabid acorns! I don't have anything else I can lose...
Okay. I see how it is, I'll start undoing my dress.
Dealer, are you rubbing this in?
I guess I lose... Oh, well, it was a fun game, anyway!
Is that it? I'll... I'll start getting ready.
I guess that's it!
Etria? I think you might be mistaken, Chiaki- My inn is in Iorys.
Cute, huh? It's flattering to hear that from such a pretty woman, Jura!
Am I really such an unusual sight?
Of course my ears are real! You can touch one to check, if you want, Meia!
Huh? Is something wrong with my ears?
Maid? Heh, no, silly, I'm an innkeeper!
Uh, Jura? It isn't a hat, my ears are real!
Oh, really? I've never thought I seemed 'motherly'- Oh, and tell Ezra congratulations on her baby for me!
Guess I'm the first one down!
Last one naked, huh? I'm glad I made it this far!
I should be glad I came this far without losing anything!
Oh well!
I'm still far ahead, but I can even the playing field somewhat!
It's about time I caught up to everyone, anyway!
Yknow, I made it this far because I have lucky feet!
I guess it's time I joined you all!
Well, I came this far.
Etria? I think you might be mistaken, Chiaki- My inn is in Iorys.
Cute, huh? It's flattering to hear that from such a pretty woman, Jura!
Am I really such an unusual sight?
Of course my ears are real! You can touch one to check, if you want, Meia!
Huh? Is something wrong with my ears?
Maid? Heh, no, silly, I'm an innkeeper!
Uh, Jura? It isn't a hat, my ears are real!
Oh, really? I've never thought I seemed 'motherly'- Oh, and tell Ezra congratulations on her baby for me!
Guess I'm the first one down!
At least I'm not the first one making a showing.
No one can fault me for doing my best.
I did what I could, but I still have a lot to lose, so this is fine!
It's kind of a close match, don't you think? Oh well!
Well, it's only fair. I did lose, after all!
My dress, now? Are you sure...?
I usually don't wear bras, anyway, but...
Oh well!
Etria? I think you might be mistaken, Chiaki- My inn is in Iorys.
Cute, huh? It's flattering to hear that from such a pretty woman, Jura!
Am I really such an unusual sight?
Of course my ears are real! You can touch one to check, if you want, Meia!
Huh? Is something wrong with my ears?
Maid? Heh, no, silly, I'm an innkeeper!
Uh, Jura? It isn't a hat, my ears are real!
Oh, really? I've never thought I seemed 'motherly'- Oh, and tell Ezra congratulations on her baby for me!
Guess I'm the first one down!
Huh? This early? Aw.
This is what my guests would call a dice-ive victory! Or was it decisive?
I know I'm losing, but sore losers never have any fun.
I hope this streak of bad luck ends soon...
Maybe this streak of bad luck will end soon.
W-what? I have to? Really?
But...
Game, huh? Running the inn might be fun work, but I wouldn't call it that...
A girl, huh? Huh... I've never really thought of that.
Alright, suit yourself! Lemme know if you change your mind, though.
Taguel? No, I'm a Therian! Is this your first time meeting one?
'Fama'? I guess it must be! And that sounds like fun, Meia- Thank you for offering!
...? Uh, Jura? You look a little shocked- Were you expecting me to have rabbit feet?
I'll count my armband and bracelets as one thing, since it seems kinda unfair otherwise.
Go on, shoo, shoes!
I've been told that stockings look good with short dresses, but I just wear these because they're warm.
I learned to mend earlier this year so I can patch up my apron whenever! It's like the saying goes, a stitch in time saves nine!
Just a second! This dress is trickier to get off than it looks.
No one's ever seen these bare before...
Okay, I won't waste any more time. Here it comes!
I still think you're mistaken, Chiaki, but you're welcome anyway!
You look kinda worried, Elizabeth- Don't be! I don't plan on losing.
You're gonna have to work harder than that to get a shot at my tail, though, Jin!
Nice to meet you, Rinkah! I hope we can be friends!
Hehe! I'm glad you agree, Elizabeth!
It's fine, Elizabeth- I understand.
...? Elizabeth? Everything alright?
You know, my big sister's always bothered that I only wear a band on one arm, but I think it looks cuter like that!
I prefer to go without shoes, usually, anyway. The ground just feels nicer without them~
And the ~background.surface~'s kinda cold, so I guess I was right to!
That means 'You should always carry thread in case your clothes get torn by accident'.
If I just think of this like going to the beach, it's a bit less embarrassing.
H-hey, don't stare at them like that! It's like you're trying to burn a hole in me!
...Huh! That wasn't as hard as I thought it would be... Uh, please don't stare, anyway.
It must be nerve-wracking to strip in front of a bunch of girls- You must be brave, ~player~!
I wonder what you'll take off, ~player~!
~player~, you seem pretty quiet. What's that about?
What will you take off, ~player~?
Cmon, ~player~, take the heat off me for a bit!
Sorry, ~player~, but I don't wanna lose my dress.
I'm glad I won't be the only one naked.
You couldn't just win forever, ~name~!
~player~, you're really handsome...
Thanks, ~player~, I could use a bit of help...
I coulda used this earlier, but oh well!
Huh...? Oh, right! The game's still going!
It must be nerve-wracking to strip in front of a bunch of girls- You must be brave, ~name~!

state.text: You have things you can afford to lose, right, ~name~?

case.state: Yknow what they say, all's fair in love and poker! ...What do you mean it's 'love and war'?
Hehe! Sorry, ~name~, but I can't show mercy in a game like this!
Looks like it's your turn, ~name~!
Don't worry, I've walked in on a few male guests before, so you don't have anything I haven't seen.
Sorry, does my being here make this hard on you?
It's like the proverbs say, the fastest way to get to know someone is to see them naked! I don't get that one...
Don't worry- I'm not staring! It's hard to tell, I know...
No worries! You have a few more lines of defense!
We're all friends here, so don't worry!
Haha! I knew I wouldn't be alone in my almost-nakedness forever!
Whew! Don't take this the wrong way, but I'm relieved it's you!
Sorry you lost, but I can't just let you beat me, ~name~!
You've gotta join me, ~name~!
Hah! The cards finally caught up with you! Take the heat off me, won't you?
You can't bail out, now! I am naked, after all!
I hear this is supposed to be easier when you see something you like, so please take off something big!
This will help, thank you, ~name~!
I masturbated for you, so you have no excuse to get hot feet! ...It's cold feet? Hrrrm.
You can't get embarrassed, now! You were looking at me, before.
~player~ has to undress!
I gotta say, I'm most interested in you, ~player~! You're so mysterious...
Your outfit's really cute, ~player~! Too bad you have to take it off.
Hey, ~player~, join me!
Yes! That's another round I can keep my dress!
Hey, I hope me being naked makes this easier for you, ~player~.
Sorry, ~player~, but I can't afford to lose another hand!
I'm excited to see you strip, ~player~...
You don't mind if I look, right? Is it okay?
Hey, you can't get shy after what I just did!
You were watching me, before, so I'll watch you.
Florina, we're all in the same boat, here! ...Thanks for stopping her, Lyn.
Uh! Are we allowed to do that?
Hey, Aella! Are you an adventurer, by any chance? You've got that look about you...
Huh? Aimee? What are you-
W-wait, don't-
Aimee, you're going to-
You're going to hurt someone-!
There's no talking you out of this, huh?
Hmm... Blake, this might sound weird, but being around you... Reminds me of home, somehow.
Blake? You seem kinda nervous, everything okay?
You're from another planet, right, Meia? You've GOT to tell me what kind of place it is!
You know, I heard stories of pirates from a few of my guests, but you don't seem as frightening as all the stories say...
Oh, do you play this a lot, Moon?
Wow, you're really cute, Natsuki! I love how you've done your hair~
Pyrrha... as in, 'pyrrhic victory'? I've heard the term used in Iorys, before.
Wow, Sola! Those are some soft-looking ears you have! ...Or is it a hat?
We're all girls, so this is fine, right?
Cmon, ~name~! We're all friends here!
Haha! I guess I'm better at poker than I thought!
Don't get flustered, ~name~, just focus on winning the next round!
~name~, you've got such an interesting style- It's really cute!
I've changed around my sisters, before, so you don't have to be shy for my sake.
You're really pretty, ~name~! It isn't weird to say that, right?
You're so fashionable, ~name~! Or did you dress up for this?
Have you played this, before, ~name~? I'm curious...
If it makes it easier, you can pretend we're not here?
We get our clothes back at the end, so it should be fine, right?
~name~? You're looking a bit red, do you feel okay?
Thanks for taking the heat off of me, ~name~!
Sorry, ~name~, but I can't give up my dress, yet!
At the end of the day, one of us is going to wind up naked, huh?
Cmon, I got naked for this, so be fair, ~name~!
I'm not gonna apologize for winning, this time, ~name~.
Sorry, ~name~, but I can't let you beat me when I'm like this!
I used to think I wasn't into girls, but this game has really opened my eyes! ...not- not literally.
Cmon, I'm doing this for you, so be fair!
No roostering out, now! ...What do you mean it's chickening out?
It's a lot less embarrassing, now that it's over... I hope that's true for you, too, ~name~.
I'm impressed that you're playing this with a blindfold!
Ah, so you're finally taking that off?
Don't your wings get in the way of that manuver, Pit?
This game isn't as bad as my big sister said!
It's a good idea to wear accessories to a game like this, huh.
Aww, that's everything?
Oh, your ~clothing~, huh?
A lot of the men I know are snappy dressers- You're on that list, too, ~name~!
You wear a lot less accessories than the men where I come from...
Hey, you have a lot to lose, so it's fine!
Are you... rubbing this in?
I took off my dress, and you're just taking off your ~clothing~?
I know you're not doing this to spite me, but...
I should be happy that you're finally taking some losses!
Well, that was anti-climactic...
I can't believe you kept that this entire time!
Hehe, I guess the gloves are coming off, now! I expected the blindfold, first...
You have such pretty eyes, 9S...
I know my ears always get in the way of wearing hats!
Your ~clothing~ looked good on you, but you look good without it too!
Maybe I should've worn more...
Well, I'm not a hippo, so I can't get mad! ...Huh? Hippo isn't short for hypocrite?
You must have a good strategy planned out!
I don't know much about fashion, but I thought your ~clothing~ looked good on you.
Your ~clothing~? A pretty practical choice, though.
Now, what's the next hand...
You're doing really well, ~name~!
I should watch you for tips!
I'm impressed, ~name~! I've gotta get good!
I guess it is a competition.
Then again, I did have to get naked for that to happen...
Don't mind me, I'm just... having some stage fright.
You did great, ~name~.
It's just a ribbon, don't be so nerv-
Hey, Jolyne! I'm really curious about you, yknow!
Oh, a lot of my guests carry weapons like that, too, Jura!
A yo-yo? And that keeps you safe?
So, you're like a fighter for everyone's freedom? That's so noble...
Taking off two things at the same time is kinda risky, isn't it?
Isn't poker a game of luck, though?
Revy, how come you brought guns? Is this a dangerous place?
Oh, Saki! You look like you're around my age!
W-wait, you're burning them? Is that safe?
I-if you're going to destroy all your clothes, you must be confident!
Seriously, nobody else hears that?
Sola, you seem embarrassed... But it's just a ribbon, right?
You're really fashionable, ~name~!
Oh, I think you'd look good with braids, ~name~, can I braid your hair sometime?
~name~, I don't usually hang out with girls my age! Is this a normal 'girl thing'?
I'm still new to this game, so I'm watching you for tips!
It's like the saying goes, don't sweat on the small stuff! ...What do you mean there's no 'on'?
I guess you'd wanna bring something like that to a game like this.
Well, it'd be rude if I got mad about that!
W-wait, you still have that?
Rabid acorns, you still have that?
I know this is fair, but it doesn't make me feel better.
You haven't lost much of anything, but don't let your guard down!
I can't believe you still had your ~clothing~!
It's amazing that you've still got so much.
Wait, you're a Therian!?
You've got what my guests call a 'dangerous air'... There's something about you, but I can't put my finger on what.
Granted, it's because the Inn is in the same town as a deadly labyrinth, but...
I'd love to see how that works sometime!
As for the 'no men' thing, this place must be kinda weird for you, huh? Since there are a few men here...
You must be confident, but I won't lose, Natsuki!
I don't think you can try to be lucky...
Maybe I should've brought my bow...
I hope we can get along! I don't usually hang out with people my age.
Are you going to do that for all your clothes? Be careful!
It actually only makes me more determined to win! Er, I'll loan you my apron at the end.
It sounded louded than last time, too...
It's clothing, so it'll do just fine!
I should try wearing ~clothing~ sometime...
Did you dress up for today, ~name~, or do you always dress like this?
Your ~clothing~ looked good on you! It feels like I'm at a sleepover...
Starting with small stuff makes sense to me!
Your ~clothing~ made you look super cute!
I should try wearing something like your ~clothing~, sometime...
Your ~clothing~ really suited you, though.
You're doing really well, ~name~.
You're better at this game than I thought, ~name~!
~name~, I'm impressed that you still had that! Could I practice with you, sometime?
I'll just have to play better!
I'm in this state, after all- You could be next.
That really doesn't make this easier for me...
You must have a lot of experience with cards, ~name~!
Hey, Ryuji! If you want, you can pat my ears.
You're out of accessories so soon?
Oh, you're taking off your ~clothing~?
I guess you're all out of trinkets, then!
I really like your ~clothing~! Shame it has to come off.
Not bad, ~name~! But we're gonna keep chipping away!
There goes another line of defense.
Well, it's better than an accessory.
At least it wasn't something super tiny...
It's less satisfying when I'm in this state...
I lost, but I think watching you taught me more about the game, ~name~!
Rabbits are supposed to be lucky, after all! It might keep you safe next round!
Well, you've still got that, so it's not all bad!
I'm glad we're making progress!
Well, this is the object of the game, isn't it?
Oh, hey, before I forget to ask! We do get our clothes back at the end, don't we?
Don't forget to fold your ~clothing~! You probably don't want wrinkles.
Now, where's the next hand?
This is more fun than I thought it'd be!
Even if I AM down to my undies...
Don't let your guard down, though!
I'll just see what happens next...
Maybe we should play another round, sometime...
Haha! And off come the glo-
Sounds like the kinda life where you have to be strong... It almost reminds me of the people who explore Yggdrasil.
Eek!
Aaah!
...Wait, did you all hear that?
I thought you wore more accessories than that!
Are you all out of accessories, ~name~?
Your ~clothing~ looked super cute, but I guess clothes are meant to come off, here!
It's not weird to say that you're pretty without your ~clothing~, is it?
I'm glad you still had that!
This means we're making progress, right?
Oh, right! You had that, huh?
Oh, ~clothing~, huh?
At least it's not an accessory...
Just so you know, I'm cheering you on, now, ~name~!
Oh. Oh.
Are you going to do that every time?!
Is there no convincing you to stop that?
I can't be the only one who heard that, right?
I guess less is more, right, ~name~?
Did you think I'd be embarrassed? I know what I'm getting into!
I grew up with two sisters, so I've seen other girls undress before.
It's probably easier when it's small things.
I should try wearing something like your ~clothing~, sometime...
You're doing great, ~name~!
This is more fun than I thought it'd be!
I'm kinda jealous, you're real good at this game.
I gotta practice at this game, more.
That makes this a bit more bearable...
Then again, I guess it's more fun to lose this game?
W-wait, you're taking off something that big this soon?
Something that big? Are you sure?
That shows a lot of skin, ~name~. Do you want me to look away?
Don't worry- I'll close my eyes while you take off your ~clothing~!
It's not like you're going to be naked, but...
You're all out of places to go now, huh?
This is only fair, right? Given the state I'm in, I mean.
You still have a little more... But it makes me feel a bit better.
Are you taking that off for my benefit?
Oh, you're taking off your ~clothing~ already?
I just... Feel kinda bad about this. Maybe I should throw?
I do feel kind of bad that you have to take that off, though...
I've caught glimpses of male guests before, but this is my first time getting a good look...
Don't worry, I wasn't looking! You could tell, right?
This makes me root for you, a bit!
You've gotta draw better hands, now, though, right?
Now, where's that next hand?
It'll be easier to focus when I'm not the only one this undressed!
Thanks for taking off something big, ~name~!
Thanks, ~name~... It really helps.
Sorry, I was a bit distracted, so I kinda lost track of the game...
Waah!!
Ah! Ladybug, you're glowing!!
Not many people have seen what?
That sound, again! It's coming from... Shimakaze?
Yeek!
You seriously don't have anything else?
If it makes it easier, you can pretend we're in a bath house- Oh! Or a changing room.
We're both women, so please don't be shy for my sake!
Your ~clothing~ covered a lot of skin, but don't worry! You haven't lost everything!
Wait, you're all out of options, then?
We're getting down to it now, aren't we?
Oh, you'll be joining me, then, ~name~?
It's a lot easier when there isn't a huge imbalance!
~name~, you're really pretty...
Your ~clothing~, huh? That's pretty big!
Aimee, what was that!? You could've hurt someone!
So that's what you look like! I dunno why you wore that mask- You're real cute!
A scar like that could never make you ugly. Don't forget that, Misato.
Is that sound you destroying your clothes? I hope it doesn't get any louder...
Sorry! I should get used to loud noises when you strip, huh?
Would it make you feel better if I threw a round?
~name~, I hope you don't mind if I watch you! ...Er, for tips, of course.
Don't worry, I'm not staring! ...It's hard to tell, I know.
I do feel bad you lost something that big, though...
Things should be fine, though- You've got a few more lines of defense.
Okay! Uhm- I can look away if you want, though?
Now, where's that next hand...?
That makes this feel a lot less awkward!
Maybe you'll catch up to me, soon.
I don't care if telling you that is weird anymore.
Then again, it's late in the game...
Wait, this soon?
I've seen men's chests before, but this just feels more... intimate.
I'm glad to even the playing field, some!
Thanks, ~name~. Every bit helps...
I can't help but feel sort of bad about this...
Oooh, are you an adventurer, ~name~? You have the build for that sort of thing.
It's easier when I'm not the only one exposed.
You're built really well, ~name~...

state.text: Huh? You're going to be... showing that so soon?

case.state: I'm gonna try not to stare, ~name~.
I didn't expect to beat you, ~name~!
I'm naked, too, so you can't get shy!
~name~, you don't have to do this- but I won't complain if you do!
Is it cold in here, ~name~?
Aw, it's really small! It's kinda cute.
I don't really think size matters, here...
This really is a fun game...
You can tap out, now, if you need to, ~name~...
Sorry if this is awkward for you, ~name~...
Are you embarrassed, ~name~?
It looks so good, ~name~...
T-that looks pretty inconvenient.
I-is it normal for them to get that big?
Isn't that heavy?
How do you deal with something that big!?
Be careful with that peel! We don't want anyone slipping!!
Oof!
Wait, you're shaving? Won't that get super itchy, Felicia?
Well, I'm glad you're happy, Moon, but...
Trust me, I know how you feel.
~name~, you lost everything else already?
This isn't too weird, right? We have all the same parts...
My chest is bare, too, so don't be nervous!
~name~, it's okay if I look, right?
Hey, at least your hair is covering you up!
Do you need practice at this game? We can try to play another round, together!
Don't worry, ~name~! Size doesn't matter!
Those look pretty easy to manage.
Oh, they're so cute!
O-oh! Well, I guess that works just as well?
What do you plan on doing if you hit one of us?
I probably shouldn't judge!
This feels really unfair. Would it help if I undid my dress?
~name~, I hope you don't mind if I stare...
Hey, I think we match!
They're just like mine...
T-those look like they're really heavy!
Those kinda look like they hurt...
I hope you brought something to cover up with when we all head home.
Those look so uncomfortable...
Doesn't your back hurt?
Yeek!
I don't get why people shave down there, anyway. Isn't hair natural, there?
Huh? What's that smell...?
And that's everything! At least nothing else will get destroyed...
I'm a tiny bit guilty about this...
Y-you have to? Really?
I must be better at poker than I thought if I beat you!
We're both naked- Does that make this easier for you?
It kind of feels like I'm about to do something dirty...
At least you're out of clothes to shoot, now.
Do what makes you happy, though!
Wait, WHAT!?
Hey, uh, if you need it, I'll give you my apron when the game's over...
Hey, I think we match!
You can do that with your hair? Isn't it itchy?
Huh! I wasn't aware you could do that with your hair.
No one will get upset if you tap out!
W-wow, it looks a little different from mine...
Huh, it looks a lot... different from mine.
It looks so cute! ...Sorry, that was weird to say.
It's a good kind of dirty, though.
Huh!? Now? But...
Are you sure you're okay with this?
Uh, if it makes it easier, you can look at me while you do that!
You don't mind if I watch, do you?
Mmmh- h-huh? You're joining me?
After I did it for you, you should have no issue!
I'm sorry, ~name~, this feels pretty unfair...
Is it really okay for me to watch this...? Like, really?
That is what kind of game this is, right...?
J-just because I'm curious, of course!
Doing it together makes it feel better...
Maybe once this is all over, you could spend the night at my inn, if you want...
Don't worry- I'm not looking...
Er, nice... technique? Is that right?
You're really brave, ~name~. This must be pretty hard for you.
If it helps at all... I don't mind if you look at me. Just for a moment or two, though!
So that's how you do it...
Wow, your face is pretty red...
Just... Think of someone you like?
I wonder if my guests do this sort of thing when they're staying over...
So that's what that looks like...
I kind of like the sight of you...
You're really enjoying this- Am I helping?
Let's just try not to look each other in the eyes...
Is it really okay, to be doing this with a man...?
I'm glad that you're enjoying yourself...
Did... Is what I did, earlier, helping you, any?
H-hey, some almost got on me! Be more careful, next time.
I'm glad you had fun!
Did... Did I help?
Ah! That went further than I thought it would...
T-that helps a lot, ~name~.
You really seemed to enjoy that~!
Well, I'm glad no more shooting will be going on...
I wonder how someone like you is going to do this...
W-wait, this isn't a place to wre-
S-Shimakaze?! Wait- Are you okay!?
Really? You have to?
We're both girls, so this should be okay...
Just pretend it's the bath house, Jenetta...
It's fine! Just... Pretend I'm not here!
O-oh, you, too, ~name~?
Your turn, now!
You're not even going to put down the gun!?
Huh!? A-another person- Are we allowed to do that!?
Why do I bother?
W-wait, hold on! Are you alright-!?
I feel bad for making you do this...
Still, it feels really... Exciting to be watching this!
It's okay, I won't look.
If my being here makes it difficult, I mean...
I-I'm fine, let's just...
I did it, so you should have no problem.
Oh, whew! You're okay...
Fingers away from the trigger, Aimee...
Just... keep at it?
Huh, I never thought about doing it like that, before...
You probably can't tell, but I'm not looking!
Huh, I should try doing it like that...
You sure are noisy, ~name~.
Watching is more exciting than I thought it'd be...
Wow, aren't you being a little rough?
I could be next... I gotta focus...
I should try that technique sometime...
Oh, wow- You're so red...
Does it normally get that wet, for you...?
Am I helping, at all?
Wow- you're making a really cute face, ~name~...

Did I make an expression like that, earlier?
A-Aimee! Are you okay!? Rabid acorns, I told you that would happen!
I'm glad you were able to shake off your nervousness, at least!
Does it feel better to do it in front of a crowd, ~name~?

You, uh, had fun, huh?

I'm glad you had fun!
W-wait, I have to do WHAT?! You never told me that!

This feels pretty good...
At least I don't have to worry about eye-contact...
I don't have experience doing this- Er, I don't think anyone here does...
Ffff- fu- ahh...

A-ahh! Fuck!
Huh? Did I... Rabid Acorns, I'm sorry!
Whew, that was... pretty fun, actually!
The future is now, old man!
Huh, I won? I guess I did something right!
